cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.21.1.0)
set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "/home/lucia/02_Science/lpjguess/code/trunk/cmake")
cmake_policy(SET CMP0126 OLD)
project(CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE CXX)
set(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE 1)
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${COMPILE_DEFINITIONS}")
set(CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS "")
set(CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS "${CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS} ${EXE_LINKER_FLAGS}")
include_directories(${INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
set(CMAKE_SUPPRESS_REGENERATION 1)
link_directories(${LINK_DIRECTORIES})

include("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}//cmTC_14772Targets.cmake")

cmake_policy(SET CMP0065 NEW)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0083 OLD)
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "/home/lucia/02_Science/lpjguess/code/trunk/cmake-build-debug/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp")
add_executable(cmTC_14772 "/home/lucia/02_Science/lpjguess/code/trunk/cmake-build-debug/CMakeFiles/FindMPI/test_mpi.cpp")
target_link_libraries(cmTC_14772  "MPI::MPI_CXX" )
